text.content:
Backswing

You deal the attack's normal damage to yourself instead of the target.

Melee

Wide Open

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: Flat-Footed until end of your next turn] .

Ranged

Tripped

You fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Unarmed

Tangled in your Gear

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Encumbered] until you spend 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Interact] actions to free your self.
